About this game

In "Tropic Trouble," players find themselves stranded on a deserted island, tasked with building their dream paradise by solving match-3 puzzles.

By clearing puzzles, you unlock resources to build and customize your island, turning a deserted land into a thriving resort.

Disclaimer

TOPBOOKOFRA.COM IS A PLATFORM FOR HAVING FUN. THE PROBABILITY OF WINNING PLAYING THIS GAME CANNOT BE CONSIDERED THE SAME AS WINNING IN REAL LIFE GAMES. GAME ISAVAILABLE TO ADULT AUDIENCES OVER 18 YEARS OF AGE. ENJOY PLAYING THIS GAME!

How to play

  • Match elements

    Line up three or more similar items to clear the board and earn resources.

  • Solve puzzles

    Each level presents unique challenges with limited moves. Plan your strategies wisely!

  • Build and decorate

    Use resources from puzzles to build structures, beautify your island, and unlock new areas.

  • Complete quests

    Engage in various quests and challenges to earn extra rewards and boost your progress.

  • Interact with characters

    Engage in various quests and challenge to earn extra rewards, boost your progress.
